# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)


#{{{{ User Code 01
# Place your code here
#}}}}

enable_language(CXX C ASM)

project(leetcode)



#{{{{ User Code 02
# Place your code here
#}}}}

# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_leetcode_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}")
set(WORKSPACE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/..")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
    .
    ./include

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-Wredundant-decls)
add_definitions(-Winline)
add_definitions(-Wswitch-enum)
add_definitions(-Wmissing-declarations)
add_definitions(-Wnon-virtual-dtor)
add_definitions(-Wzero-as-null-pointer-constant)
add_definitions(-Winit-self)
add_definitions(-Wswitch-default)
add_definitions(-Wfloat-equal)
add_definitions(-pedantic-errors)
add_definitions(-g)
add_definitions(-O0)
add_definitions(-Og)
add_definitions(-gdwarf-2)
add_definitions(-pedantic)
add_definitions(-W)
add_definitions(-fopenmp)
add_definitions(-Wextra)
add_definitions(-std=c++20)
add_definitions(-Wall)

# Linker options
set(LINK_OPTIONS -fopenmp)
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${LINK_OPTIONS} -O0)


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
link_directories(
    .
)

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/tests/test_13.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/problem_13.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/tests/test_9.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/problem_9.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/leetcode.cpp
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -Wredundant-decls -Winline -Wswitch-enum -Wmissing-declarations -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Wzero-as-null-pointer-constant -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wfloat-equal -pedantic-errors -g -O0 -Og -gdwarf-2 -pedantic -W -fopenmp -Wextra -std=c++20 -Wall")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_library(leetcode SHARED ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS} ${ASM_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(leetcode ${LINK_OPTIONS})



#{{{{ User Code 3
# Place your code here
#}}}}
